channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole in middle of the road (Northern section of Andover Street), 13th December
item.description:
This pothole was circled with white when others in Andover Street were similarly marked. The others were repaired some while ago but this one was not: it must have been missed. It is impossible to avoid as it in the middle of the road, between the lines of parked cars. Could it please be filled in as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Andover Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep set of potholes outside balcarras school, 13th December
item.description:
I drove through these potholes in the dark resulting in a damage to the tyre and possibly also suspension. It was dark and the holes were not highlighted

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Firbank Balcarras Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: IKEA shelving unit on the grass verge of Buckingham Avenue for several weeks, 13th December
item.description:
I think it’s ruined now because of the wet and needs to be called fly tipping. while you’re here pick up the frame for the road sign just round the corner on Devon thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Buckingham Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge obstructing narrow footpath, 12th December
item.description:
Please trim the hedge alongside the footpath on Shurdington Road, connecting the Farmfield Road bus stop with Leckhampton Gate. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Shurdington Road, Up Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Tommy Taylor's Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Graffiti on wall, 12th December
item.description:
The word "sheeple" has been painted to a wall on this street - please could it be painted out - thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Wellington Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Large amount of litter thrown in hedge, 12th December
item.description:
There is a large amount of litter thrown into the hedge by this car park.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Faithfull House Suffolk Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faulty temporary lights, 12th December
item.description:
I have now seen at least three occasions (and now today) when the temporary pedestrian crossing lights have failed to red causing confusion and delay. There was never any pedestrian lights on this road so why add this complication during the road works? In addition I have seen motorists confused by these lights in proximity to contra flow lights - leading to near misses. This is an important ambulance route and so needs to be kept moving. This is not helping. Please review urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Brackens OLD GLOUCESTER, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very wonky lamppost outside five Brooklyn Road, 12th December
item.description:
This lamppost has recently started leaning severely I don’t know what happened it’s showing no signs of being hit so maybe all the rain has made the ground below it soft

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead end sign in Bishops Close., 10th December
item.description:
The dead end sign has turned and isn't facing the junction for Bishops Close. Some people think that they can get through by my house but it's definitely a dead end. Could there be another sign on the other side of the turn too?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Tobyfield Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No turn right sign, 10th December
item.description:
The no turn right sign on the tesco carpark exit has been turned and people are unable to read it. Could a second one be put on the other side of road coming from rhe carpark? It is a dangerous turn when turning right.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elm Tree Community Centre, 24 Church Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Very large pothole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing problem with sinkhole, 10th December
item.description:
This sinkhole was patched up in August. Within days it was sinking again. It is now so bad that when lorries drive over it it sends vibrations through my house. The sinkhole needs to be properly repaired before it causes an accident or does damage to my house.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 86 Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet
